data.text: @PokerPolitics Formerly, their love of racism overcame their love of dictators, but now, finally, they can really embrace Xi and ignore that he's not white like daddy Putin.

@MHYam @PokerPolitics I’m so old I remember when the PRC had ‘diplomatic mission’, in D.C., in lieu of an embassy. Wisconsin & VanNess NW, a nondescript office building, with a couple cars always parked (illegally) in the alley.
@PokerPolitics @CollinFisher They’re just desperate for a distraction from their boss’ invasion of Ukraine.

@GrouchoG @PokerPolitics Just following the news like the rest of us and trying to tie it together into their grand unified (bullshit) theory. It'd be sad if it wasn't so dangerous. Russia itself is now pushing Qanon themed theories like this in an attempt to counter the global outrage against it.
@PokerPolitics War is peace, freedom is slavery, and ignorance is strength
@PokerPolitics Pompeo getting booked by Taiwan's Not an Embassy in DC to make a speech in Taipei isn't high newsworthy when there's a big war in Europe.
@PokerPolitics IT'S ALMOST AS IF...I DON'T KNOW WHAT THE HELL'S GOING ON AND I'M JUST MAKING UP STUFF!
@PokerPolitics Everyone knows it’s impossible to travel to Taiwan unless you’re in the president’s cabinet.
@PokerPolitics It's so weird the mainstream media don't cover the fever dream going on in their minds. It makes them suspicious.
